title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 November 2012 - XWiki
content:
<mflorea> has quit  
04:03 <tekzilla> has quit  
04:06 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
04:30 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis> has quit  
08:00 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:05 <Denis> has quit  
08:12 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:36 <coud> has joined #xwiki  
08:44 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:47 <mrvanes> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
10:59 <mflorea> has quit  
12:01 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <Denis> has quit  
12:18 <abusenius> has quit  
12:50 <autoditac> has joined #xwiki  
13:21 <cjd> has quit  
13:38 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
13:49 <mrvanes> has quit  
13:55 <autoditac> hi, everybody. i am having troubles using the ImportDokuWiki Plugin - anyone in here famialr with that plugin and willing to help out?  
13:56 <vmassol> autoditac: sorry, I've not used it… what's the problem?  
13:59 <autoditac> vmassol, i get this message (http://i.imm.io/MLgd.png) klick "Send" and no pages are being imported  
14:00 <vmassol> this looks like your page has teh wrong syntax  
14:01 <autoditac> vmassol, the zip file has the structure described here: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Import+DokuWiki+into+XWiki+Application  
14:02 <vmassol> I'd need to try it out to help you further  
14:02 <vmassol> if you can make some dokuwiki zip available somewhere I could try it later maybe  
14:04 <autoditac> vmassol, thanks for your offer, but the content of that wiki is confidential  
14:05 <vmassol> sure but you could make a simple zip  
14:05 <vmassol> it's up to you  
14:05 <vmassol> I don't have access to any dokuwiki instance on my side  
14:32 <vmassol> crocket: please change the word in your license field, we don't accept vulgarities.. ;) and you need to pick a valid license  
14:32 <crocket> vmassol, It was in the list.  
14:32 <crocket> I didn't have a choice.  
14:32 <vmassol> ah  
14:32 <vmassol> it's a real license?  
14:32 <vmassol> :)  
14:33 <crocket> vmassol, I applied a modified version of BSD license.  
14:33 <crocket> It's a new license.  
14:33 <vmassol> actually you're right, sorry  
14:33 <vmassol> it's a real license  
14:33 <vmassol> http://sam.zoy.org/wtfpl/  
14:33 <vmassol> :)  
14:33 <vmassol> didn't know  
14:33 <crocket> It has a copyright and a disclaimer.  
14:33 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:34 <vmassol> mflorea: fyi I don't see the screenshot log printed in my console when running the ui test and there's a failure, do you?  
14:35 <vmassol> (when running in my IDE)  
14:35 <mflorea> vmassol: I can see it locally, and on CI too  
14:35 <vmassol> strange  
14:35 <mflorea> ah, I don't know about IDe  
14:35 <mflorea> let me try  
14:35 <vmassol> this one ran before your changes: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1262/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.extension/ExtensionTest/testSimpleSearch/ ?  
14:35 <autoditac> could it be that uploading attachments to xwiki 4.3 doesn't work with chrome?  
14:35 <vmassol> it should have created a screenshot  
14:36 <vmassol> autoditac: it works fine  
14:36 <vmassol> your extension has some problem autoditac, the code is not evaluated  
14:36 <vmassol> mflorea: this is definitely new: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1263/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.extension/ExtensionTest/testSimpleSearch/  
14:36 <vmassol> and i dn't see any log  
14:36 <vmassol> about the screenshot  
14:36 <vmassol> I've traced it lcoally so I'm sure it goes through takeScreensht  
14:37 <vmassol> it's probably just the logging system that is not configured  
14:37 <mflorea> vmassol: that's different, in extension tests there is something that changes the log level to warn so info is hidden. I haven't found the cause yet, need ti check with Thomas, but take a look here http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-4.3/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/167/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.annotations/AnnotationsTest/AddAndDeleteAnnotations/  
14:37 <mflorea> for ui-tests the log is fine  
14:37 <mflorea> on CI  
14:39 <mflorea> anyway, the screenshot is taken even for extension tests, you just have to know where to look for it for now, until I find why log level is warn  
14:39 <vmassol> yes I know it's taken  
14:39 <vmassol> we just need to fix the logging  
14:39 <mflorea> yep  
14:39 <vmassol> you could use SOP otherwise  
14:39 <vmassol> instead of LOGGEr  
14:39 <mflorea> SOP?  
14:39 <vmassol> so that we separate application logging from test logging  
14:39 <vmassol> system.out.println  
14:40 <mflorea> ah, I though that's bad :)  
14:40 <vmassol> yes in production code  
14:40 <mflorea> ok  
14:40 <mflorea> I'll try to fix the logging level first though  
14:41 <vmassol> or we need better rules for the logging configuration, I just hope it won't make it too complex  
14:41 <vmassol> yes introduce dependency in code  
14:41 <vmassol> s/yes/ie  
14:42 <mflorea> it's working fine for ui-tests, so there must be something different in extension-test but I haven't found what  
14:44 <autoditac> vmassol, i'll send you a very stripped down version of the wiki (one DokuWiki page in a zip file), if that is ok for you?  
14:44 <vmassol> autoditac: ok  
14:46 <autoditac> vmassol, did you get the send request?  
14:58 <crocket> Since when, does xwiki support component?  
15:03 <vmassol> crocket: see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Component+Module (compatibility field) + http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-1662#  
15:04 <crocket> ok  
15:06 <crocket> What about ScriptService?  
15:11 <crocket> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-5111 ?  
15:12 <crocket> I guess ScriptService is available since 3.0 RC1  
15:12 <crocket> s/is/has been/  
15:14 <jvelo> probably before that  
15:14 <jvelo> 2.x  
15:15 <crocket> jvelo, Can you refer me to the evidence?  
15:16 <jvelo> you can see XWIKI-5111 affects 2.3 so it is likely it has been created in this timeframe, meaning script service existed by then  
15:16 <jvelo> for the exact release, you have to dig JIRA or the release notes, or git history  
15:17 <crocket> jvelo : phew  
15:23 <vmassol> jvelo: hint: look at ScriptService.java  
15:23 <jvelo> vmassol: you meant crocket  
15:24 <vmassol> "for the exact release, you have to dig JIRA or the release notes, or git history"  
15:24 <vmassol> I was answering to that :)  
15:24 <vmassol> (I'm not answering crocket, he asks too many questions :))  
15:24 <jvelo> I'm not the one searching for it :)  
15:24 <vmassol> ok you seems to not know so I was helping you  
15:24 <jvelo> but yes, ScriptService.java is the file to dig  
15:25 <vmassol> crocket could have found easily by searching  
15:25 <vmassol> I alrady explained to him how to get the version for the components  
15:26 <vmassol> so he could have extrapolated and done the same for script service  
15:26 <crocket> I don't recall it now.  
15:27 <jvelo> hint: press "t" on github.com xwiki platform project  
15:27 <vmassol> or jsut use what I already explained, ie. search on e.x.o  
15:29 <crocket> Oh, I was so stupid.  
15:30 <crocket> Maybe I should fire myself.  
15:31 <vmassol> <private joke for French people>Allllooo? Je vous entends mal, appuyez sur le bouton ! :)  
15:34 <jvelo> :)  
15:34 <crocket> Yay  
15:36 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <mflorea> has quit  
15:49 <rrodriguez\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:51 <rrodriguez> has quit  
15:51 <rrodriguez\_> is now known as <rrodriguez>  
16:21 <crocket> good  
16:21 <crocket> I can sleep now  
16:57 <rrodriguez\_> has joined #xwiki  
16:59 <rrodriguez\_> has quit  
17:00 <rrodriguez> has quit  
17:07 <Denis> vmassol: may be it is a terminology problem, would saying "data migration" in place of "migration" and "storage migration" would helps ?  
17:35 <jvelo> has quit  
18:17 <npm> has quit  
18:32 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
18:52 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
19:27 <autoditac> has quit  
19:30 <abusenius> has quit  
22:39 <Denis> has quit  
23:58 <coud> has quit
